job_description:

ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Senior Java Full Stack Developer (Mountain View, CA)
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Full Stack Developer position in Mountain View, CA. I am excited about this opportunity and confident that my 11+ years of experience align closely with the requirements you are looking for.

I have a strong background in designing and developing full-stack Java applications, with expertise in front-end technologies like Angular and React, along with backend technologies such as Spring Boot and Hibernate. My experience also includes working with databases like MySQL and Oracle.

Some key highlights from my career include:
- Developing responsive and user-friendly web applications that meet both business and technical requirements.
- Implementing RESTful APIs and microservices architecture to enhance scalability and performance.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions within project timelines.

I have attached my resume for your review. I am eager to discuss how my skills and experiences can contribute to your team's success. Please let me know if there is any additional information needed from my end.

Looking forward to the opportunity to further discuss how I can bring value to your organization.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
JOB : Java Developer With Groovy 
Location : Mclean VA Onsite 

Please share me Resume to Pankaj.k@ehub.global 
 
Responsibilities:
Develop, enhance, and maintain applications using Groovy, Java, and rela technologies.
Write clean, reusable, and efficient Groovy scripts for automation and appl
Work with frameworks such as Grails or Gradle (if applicable).
Integrate applications with REST/SAOP APIs and backend systems.
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance.
Collaborate in code review and design discussions.
Develop and maintain technical documentation.

Required Skills:
 Strong hands-on experience with Groovy scripting,
 Experience with Java and JVM-based technologies
 Familiarity with Grails, Gradle, Spring or related frameworks.
 Solid understanding of object-oriented programming and design principles.
 Experience integrating with REST/SOAP web services.
 Knowledge of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Git, Maven, etc.).
 Good understanding of SQL and relational databases.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

With over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable enterprise applications using Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, and the Spring Framework, I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your client's team.

job_description:
Hello All,
Hope you are doing well!! üòä
Greetings from MTK Technologies!!
I have an urgent opening 100% closable.
Interested can share their profiles at ayushj@mtktechnologies.com

Title: Java UI Developer
Location: Raleigh, NC
Duration: Fulltime
 
Job Description
Must Have Technical/Functional Skills
 ‚Ä¢            Strong proficiency in Core Java and Java UI frameworks (e.g., JavaFX, Swing, or Vaadin).
‚Ä¢             Experience with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern front-end libraries (React, Angular, or similar).
‚Ä¢             Familiarity with Spring Framework, REST APIs, and MVC architecture.
‚Ä¢             Knowledge of build tools (Maven, Gradle) and version control (Git).
‚Ä¢             Understanding of Agile methodologies and CI/CD pipelines.
‚Ä¢             Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
 
Roles & Responsibilities
 ‚Ä¢            Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
‚Ä¢             Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
‚Ä¢             Familiarity with UI/UX principles and accessibility standards.

email_subject: Application for Java UI Developer (Raleigh, NC)
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to express my genuine interest in the Java UI Developer position at MTK Technologies in Raleigh, NC.

Having reviewed the job description, I am excited about the opportunity to leverage my strong proficiency in Core Java, Java UI frameworks, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to contribute effectively to your team. My experience with Spring Framework, REST APIs, and front-end libraries aligns well with the technical requirements outlined in the job description.

I have hands-on experience with build tools like Maven, Git for version control, and a good understanding of Agile methodologies and CI/CD pipelines. Additionally, my knowledge of cloud platforms, containerization, and UI/UX principles make me well-suited for this role.

I have attached my resume for your review. I would welcome the chance to discuss how my skills and experiences align with the needs of MTK Technologies. Please let me know if there is any further information needed.

Looking forward to the opportunity to further discuss how I can contribute to your team.
